title: Southern Charm: Wishing You Nutting But The Best
description: Part two of the Southern Charm reunion ties up loose ends with Naomie and Craig, but the real fireworks come from Taylor, who gives Shep a tongue-lashing two years in the making. Not everyone is born for corn, sadly.
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
